data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in K. Maras, Turkey to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,075,296 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of K. Maras, Turkey
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 404 believers in K. Maras, Turkey to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 404 believers in K. Maras against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of K. Maras words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Karachai people.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,075,700 souls in K. Maras and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of K. Maras an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary:
the state of K. Maras, Turkey has a population of 1,075,700.

We estimate K. Maras has 404 people who might know Jesus, 6,022 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,069,274 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,662 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of K. Maras access to a Bible in their own language.
